p.font: A generic vocabulary acting as a place holder for a number of specific codes which identify the alert reason codes.Â The codes may come from definitions found in the MIM or may be defined externally.

)
The concepts identifying alert reason codes in Legitimate Relationship Alerts are defined externally in the document with FileCM reference: NPFIT-FNT-TO-REQ-DEL-0162.02 "National Alerting of Local LRs: Requirements Specification"

)
The concepts identifying alert reasons in Sealed Envelope Alerts are defined externally by the Sealed Envelope Team.

)
The concepts identifying alert reasons for dissent are defined in the MIM vocabulary DissentOveride.
